---
title: "Details for Jan 2019 Deliverable Rejections"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  word_document: default
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("./scripts/FirstPassAcceptance.R")
work <- getFPA()
work <- cleanFPA(work)
work <- process(work, Month = "Jan", Year = 2019)
```

# Reasons for rejection
```{r, echo = FALSE}
temp <- table(factor(subset(work, status == "D")$reason))
temp[order(temp, decreasing = TRUE)]
```

# Comments for reason being other
```{r, echo=FALSE}
temp <- table(subset(work, (status == "D" & reason == "Other"))$comment)
temp[order(temp, decreasing = TRUE)]
```
Note: on of the Rejections did have a comment

# Application with rejections and number of rejections
```{r, echo=FALSE}
temp <- table(factor(subset(work, status == "D")$application))
temp[order(temp, decreasing = TRUE)]
```
